thread.title: Financial Analyst at True North (San Antonio, TX)
thread.title_full: Financial Analyst at True North (San Antonio, TX)

title: Financial Analyst at True North (San Antonio, TX)
text: StartWire SUMMARY Private E&P company with more than 360,000 gross acres in the Eagle Ford Shale seeks highly motivated and self-reliant professioanl to provide Senior Management with economic and financial analysis necessary to make strategic business decisions.Candidate will support a range of activities including strategic initiatives, acquisitions, divestitures, financings, financial modeling/analysis and financial reporting. RESPONSIBILITIES Possess an understanding of corporate finance and financial modeling Analysis of potential A&D deals in and around current positions Assist in monthly, quarterly and annual financial accounting reporting processes Create presentations and other communication materials for Senior Management and the Board of Directors
